Steps to reproduce:

Firefox full screen support should allow a user to adjust the width of the web content.


Actual results:

Every site defaults to maximum screen width 


Expected results:

Much like a resize window, when in full screen, reaching the left or right edge of content should provide a resizer to allow one to narrow the width of the displayed page.
